snippet: Defense Secretary Leon E. Panetta reiterated that the United States would offer France air and logistical support, but would not send any ground troops to Mali.
lead_paragraph: Defense Secretary Leon E. Panetta reiterated that the United States would offer France air and logistical support, but would not send any ground troops to Mali.

headline.seo: Panetta Says U.S. Will Offer France Aid, But Not Troops in Mali
headline.main: Panetta Says U.S. Still in Talks With French Over Mali Aid
headline.print_headline: Panetta Says U.S. Still in Talks With French Over Mali Aid

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
